Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o27 pages LaTeX2e, 21 figures. The statementsof theorem 4.1 and corollary 4.2 have been corrected, and a proof has been added. We thank Sachin Valera for pointing out the mistake in the original statement of theorem 4.1
. At the same time some of the references have been updated\u00a7r
